<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:05.66%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">
<DIV STYLE="FLOAT:LEFT">
</DIV>
	61&nbsp;
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Certain statements and information in this Form 10-K may constitute &#x201C;forward-looking statements&#x201D; within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995, Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the &#x201C;1933 Act&#x201D;) and Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#x201C;1934 Act&#x201D;). The words &#x201C;believe,&#x201D; &#x201C;estimate&#x201D;, &#x201C;project&#x201D;, &#x201C;expect,&#x201D; &#x201C;anticipate,&#x201D; &#x201C;plan,&#x201D; &#x201C;intend,&#x201D; &#x201C;foresee,&#x201D; &#x201C;should,&#x201D; &#x201C;would,&#x201D; &#x201C;could&#x201D; or other similar expressions are intended to identify forward-looking statements, which are generally not historical in nature. These forward-looking statements are based on our current expectations and beliefs concerning future developments and their potential effect on us. These forward-looking statements and other information are based on our beliefs as well as assumptions made by us using information currently available. Such statements reflect our current views with respect to future events and are subject to certain risks, uncertainties and assumptions. Should one or more of these risks or uncertainties materialize, or should underlying assumptions prove incorrect, actual results may vary materially from those described herein as anticipated, believed, estimated, expected or intended. We are making investors aware that such forward-looking statements, because they relate to future events, are by their very nature subject to many important factors that could cause actual results to differ materially from those contemplated. Such factors include, but are not limited to:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	material breaches in the security of our systems;&nbsp;market acceptance of developing technologies that make Financial Payment Cards less relevant;&nbsp;a slower or less
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	widespread adoption of EMV and dual-i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	nterface EMV technology than we anticipate;&nbsp;difficulties in our production processes;&nbsp;defects in our software;&nbsp;our failure to operate our business in accordance with the PCI security standards or other industry standards such as Payment Card Brand certification standards;&nbsp;extension of card expiration cycles;&nbsp;a decline in U.S. and global market and economic conditions; failure to identify, attract and retain new customers or a failure to maintain our relationships with our major customers;&nbsp;our substantial indebtedness;&nbsp;infringement on our intellectual property rights, or claims that our technology is infringing on third-party intellectual property;&nbsp;failure to meet our customers&#x2019; demands in a timely manner;&nbsp;competition and/or price erosion in the payment card industry;&nbsp;our dependence on licensing arrangements;&nbsp;inability to renew leases for our facilities;&nbsp;interruptions in our IT systems or production capabilities;&nbsp;the restrictive terms of our credit facility and covenants of future agreements governing indebtedness;&nbsp;non-compliance with, and changes in, laws in foreign jurisdictions in which we operate and sell our products;&nbsp;challenges related to our acquisition strategy;&nbsp;our dependence on specialized equipment from third party suppliers;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and other risks that are described
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in

<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	MARKET DATA
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	This Annual Report on Form 10-K includes statistical data extracted from a market research report prepared by First Annapolis Consulting, Inc. ("First Annapolis"), which was commissioned by us and was issued in May 2015. First Annapolis provides consulting and investment banking services with a focus on payments-based industries. Unless otherwise indicated, all market data presented in this Annual Report on Form 10-K is derived from data estimated and reported by First Annapolis or estimated by us using such data as the primary source. The data presented in this Annual Report on Form 10-K, including data provided by First Annapolis, involves a number of assumptions and limitations and contains projections and are subject to a high degree of uncertainty. We caution you not to give undue weight to such projections, assumptions and estimates. Some data contained in this Annual Report on Form 10-K is also based on our good faith estimates, which are derived from management's knowledge of the industry and independent sources. Industry publications, surveys and forecasts generally state that the information contained therein has been obtained from sources believed to be reliable; however, we have not independently verified any of the data from third-party sources nor have we ascertained the underlying economic assumptions relied upon therein. In addition, statements as to our market position and projections, assumptions and estimates of our future performance are based on data currently available to us, and such estimates involve risks and uncertainties and are subject to change based on various factors, including those discussed in Part 1, Item 1A &#x2013; "Risk Factors" in this Annual Report on Form 10-K.

<EFX_PART_I>
<A NAME="FIS_PART_I"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	PART
</FONT>
<A NAME="PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_PARTI_419">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	I
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 46.8PT;TEXT-INDENT: -46.8PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Item 1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 25PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Busines
</FONT>
<A NAME="PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_ITEM1BUSINESS_225850">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	As used herein, &#x201C;CPI&#x201D;, &#x201C;we&#x201D;, &#x201C;our&#x201D; and similar terms refer to CPI Card Group Inc. and its subsidiaries, unless the context indicates otherwise.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Overview
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We are a leading provider of comprehensive Financial Payment Card solutions in North America. We define
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Financial Payment Cards
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	as credit, debit and Prepaid Debit Cards issued on the networks of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Payment Card Brands
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and Interac (in Canada). In 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, we produced over
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	156.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	EMV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Financial Payment Cards
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	provided integrated card services to over
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3,250
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	card
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	issuing banks.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We define &#x201C;Prepaid Debit Cards&#x201D; as debit cards issued on the networks of the Payment Card Brands, but not linked to a traditional bank account.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We have established a leading position in the Financial Payment Card market through more than 20&nbsp;years of experience and are focused primarily on this growing subsector of the financial technology market. Our customers are pri
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	marily leading national and regional banks, independent community banks, credit unions, managers of prepaid debit programs,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Group Service Providers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; (organizations that assist small card issuers, such as credit unions, with managing their credit and debit card programs, including managing the Financial Payment Card issuance process)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and card processors. We serve a diverse set
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of over 4,000 direct and indirect customers, including many of the largest North American issuers of debit and credit cards such as JPMorgan Chase, B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ank of America
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and Wells Fargo, the largest global managers of Prepaid Debit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Card programs, including InComm, Green Dot, Blackhawk Network and American Express, as well as thousands of independent community banks, credit unions, Group Service Providers and card processors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We serve our customers through a network of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	production and card services facilities, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	eight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	high
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	security facilities in North America
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of which is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	certified by one or more of the Payment Card Brands and Interac (in Canada) and, where required by our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	customers, certified
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to be in compliance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the standards of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Payment Card Industry Security Standards Council (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	PCI Security Standards Council
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. We have the largest such network of high
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	security production facilities in North America, allowing us to optimize our solutions offerings to serve the needs of our diverse and long
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	term customer base.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We estimate that we produce
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	35
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% of all Finan
</FONT>

	cial Payment Cards in the United States, which we believe gives us the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	#1 market position by unit volume. We believe we have:
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We have grown our business significantly over the past decade, both organically and through acquisitions. Over that time period, we have completed six acquisitions, significantly increasing our geographic and market coverage, solutions offerings and capacity. On March&nbsp;9, 2010, we purchased certain assets of Premier Card Solutions, a leading provider of Financial Payment Cards, data personalization services and tamper
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	evident security packaging for Prepaid Debit Cards that utilize the payment networks of the Payment Card Brands. The Premier Card Solutions transaction significantly enhanced our offering to Prepaid Debit Card customers. On September&nbsp;2, 2014, we acquired EFT Source, a recognized leader in the financial technology industry that was named to American Banker and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Bank Administration Institute&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	FinTech Forward 100 in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. The acquisition of EFT Source significantly enhanced our card services offering, added Card@Once
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to our instant issuance card offering and expanded our end
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	end Financial Payment Card solutions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our 2014 results include four months of results from EFT Source. Adjusted EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA margin are financial measures not presented in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles (&#x201C;GAAP&#x201D;). For a definition of Adjusted EBITDA and a reconciliation of Adjusted EBITDA to net income from continuing operations, the mos
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	t comparable GAAP measure, see Part III, Item 6,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Selected Financial Data
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	business consists of the following reportable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	segments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	U.S. Debit and Credit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, which primarily produces Financial Payment Cards and provides integrated card services to card-issuing banks in the United States;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	U.S. Prepaid Debit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, which primarily provides integrated card services to Prepaid Debit Card issuers in the United States;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and U.K. Limited
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, which primarily produces retail cards, such as gift and loyalty cards for customers in the United Kingdom and continental Europe, and which are not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	certified by any of the Payment Card Brands or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to be in compliance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the standards of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the PCI Security Standards Council
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	Businesses not considered part of these segments are categorized as "Other" and include our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	operations in Ontario, Canada and Petersfield, United Kingdom
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	August 2015, we completed the shut down and closure of our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	operations at our Petersfield
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, United Kingdom
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	facility. The Petersfield
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, United Kingdom
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	facility is not material to our business. Also
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	included in &#x201C;Other&#x201D; is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	our corporate headquarters.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	For information regarding our net sales by geographic location and additional details regarding our segments, see Part II, Item&nbsp;8,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Financial Statements and Supplementary Data,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	Note 19 "Segment Reporting," and Part II, Item&nbsp;7,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	in this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Competitive Strengths
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Leading Market Position with Long
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Term Customer Relationships.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	As a market leader,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	we have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	long
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	standing trust
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	based relationships with our key customers and often deep process and technology integration, particularly in the case of customers who utilize our card services and instant issuance systems and services. The solutions that we provide require strict data integrity, and generally card issuers are reluctant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to switch away from trusted providers due to the requirements for high
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	security and access to highly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	sensitive cardholder information. As a result, our customers are selective about the partners with which they work and typically seek out partners who have a well
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	established reputation for trust and quality and are able to meet their service requirements.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We have long
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	standing relationships with our customers, many of whom we have served for decades and provide a differentiated level of service, as evidenced by our strong net pro
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	moter score, a customer satisfaction metric developed through customer satisfaction surveys conducted by an independent market research firm. We also maintain important relationships with the Payment Card Brands to ensure our facilities and processes consistently meet their standards.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Well Positioned for EMV Conversion in the United States.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	As a leading provider of integrated credit, debit and Prepaid Debit Card solutions in North America, we are well
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	positioned to capitalize on the U.S. market conversion to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Europay, Mastercard and Visa (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	EMV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;) chip technology. EMV is a global, technical standard, mainta
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ined by EMV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Co for smart payment cards
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and for payment terminals and automated teller machines that accept them.&nbsp;&nbsp;EMV cards are smart cards (also called chip cards) which store data on integrated circuits rather than magnetic stripes, although EMV cards may have magnetic stripes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;EMV cards c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	an be contact cards that must be physically inserted (or &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	dipped&#x201D;) into a reader,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	contactless cards
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that can be read over a short distance using radio-frequency identification (&#x201C;RFID&#x201D;) technology, or cards with both contact and contactless functionality (&#x201C;dual-interface EMV cards&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We serve our customers through a network of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	production and card services facilities, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	eight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	high
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	security facilities in North America that are each certified by one or more of the Payment Card Brands, Interac (in Canada) and, w
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	here required by our customers, certified
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to be in compliance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the standards of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the PCI Security Standards Council. We have made significant investments in our physical infrastructure and equipment platform to prepare for the EMV conversion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	including opening a dedicated EMV technology center in Colorado for EMV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Financial Payment Card
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	production and personalization
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and significant information technology, human capital and equipment upgrades across our network of facilities.
</FONT>

</FONT>

	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	operations. We provide card data personalization services for financial institutions and managers of Prepaid Debit Card programs that require extensive technology integration, such as secure data links to transfer highly sensitive cardholder information. Similarly, our installed base of instant issuance systems at bank and credit union branches across the United States require comparable levels of customer integration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, as our Card@Once
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	instant issuance system utilizes only our secure technology to instantly personalize cards. Certain customers have also integrated our proprietary software into their customer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	facing websites to offer card design and customization to their cardholders. We believe that our comprehensive solution allows our customers to choose a single trusted partner to address their card program needs in a cost
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	effective manner instead of managing multiple suppliers across a complex value chain. We believe our customers choose and retain us for these critical functions, which typically require integrations that are costly and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	complex
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, due to our reputation as a trusted partner, our high levels of service and proven execution.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Strong Management Team.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We have built a strong management team led by Steven Montross, our CEO and President. Mr.&nbsp;Montross has led CPI for seven years and under his leadership we have completed three strategic acquisitions and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	we have experienced significant growth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. Our management team has established a track record of recognizing and capitalizing on growth opportunities across the markets we serve. Management identified and drove our expansion into Prepaid Debit Card services during the early market adoption period of this card product. Similarly, our management team devised and executed on a strategy to develop our card services offering, which was accelerated by our acquisition of EFT Source.

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">

	Table of Contents

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Growth Strategy
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The key components of our strategy include:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Capitalize on U.S. EMV Conversion.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The conversion to the EMV standard in the United States
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is expected to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	significantly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	increase the size of the Financial Payment Card market,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	driven primarily by the increasing levels of card fraud in the United States, the Payment Card Brands&#x2019; coordinated EMV conversion plan, including the liability shift
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	which occurred on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	October&nbsp;1, 2015, and the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	desire
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for a single global interoperable standard of card acceptance. The conversion of Financial Paym
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ent Cards in the United States from magnetic stripe technology to the EMV standard began in earnest in the second half of 2014 and is expected to continue over the next several years, with full adoption in the credit and bank debit card markets expected to be largely complete by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the end of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2017 and increasing levels of adoption of Prepaid Debit Cards and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Private
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Label Credit Cards&#x201D; (credit cards issued by an individual merchant for their exclusive use) beyond 2017
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. In anticipation of the EMV conversion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and subsequently the expected further adoption of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	more complex and higher priced d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	nterface EMV cards, we invested significantly in our network of facilities, technological infrastructure and human capital resources. We believe our comprehensive solutions offering and proven track record ideally positions us to be our customers&#x2019; partner of choice to successfully complete the EMV conversion.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Capitalize on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Growth in Prepaid Debit Market.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We believe we are well positioned to capitalize on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the expected
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	growth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of the Prepaid Debit Card market
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	due to our market leading position, supported by our industry expertise
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	patents and comprehensive end
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	end card solutions. We have driven our leading market position through trust
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	based relationships with the largest global managers of Prepaid Debit Card programs, including InComm, Green Dot, Blackhawk Network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	American Express
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and NetSpend
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. Additionally, we have further developed proprietary production techniques which provide us a cost advantage and additional flexibility to meet customer demands.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Capitalize on Growth in Instant Issuance Systems and Services Market.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We acquired our instant card issuance system, Card@Once
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, through the acquisition of EFT Source in 2014 and have continued to drive significant growth in sales of our instant issuance systems and related services revenue. We plan to continue to grow our installed base of instant issuance systems in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	bank branches across the U.S.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to increase our opportunity for continued recurring revenue streams from card personalization which is delivered through our software as a service offering. We believe the U.S. market is in the early stages of instant issuance adoption as, according to First Annapolis, only approximately 20% of U.S. bank branches are equipped with instant issuance solutions.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	e believe that

	, we believe we have established a reputation as a trusted partner and advisor to our customers with the ability to securely manage significant amounts of sensitive and confidential customer data throughout our network. Due to the high costs of failure, such as a data breach, we expect that customers will continue to choose trusted vendors such as CPI that can provide high levels of security, service and certainty to manage these critical functions.

We expect to continue to opportunistically execute strategic acquisitions that give us access to new markets and capabilities while providing a reasonable value proposition to our stockholders.

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage8"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Products and Services
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	EMV Financial Payment Cards (Contact and Dual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Interface)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We pr
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	oduce c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ontact EMV cards, which feature a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	n
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	integrated circuit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that interfaces with an EMV payment terminal over a contact plate on the surface of the card when inserted into an EMV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	enabled pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ment terminal. We also produce d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	nterface EMV cards, which feature both the contact EMV technology and a RFID antenna that utilizes near field communications (&#x201C;NFC&#x201D;) technology to allow transactions to also be processed on a contactless basis when the card is brought within the requisite proximity to a NFC enabled payment terminal.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	EMV Financial Payme
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	nt Cards and Retail Gift Cards
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We produce non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	EMV cards that utilize magnetic stripes, contactless cards which utilize NFC technology and cards that include both magnetic stripes and NFC technology. In addition, we produce retail gift cards (which are not issued on the network of the Payment Card Brands) primarily in the U.K. and Canada.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Card Data Personalization
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We provide data preparation and card data personalization solutions for debit, credit and Prepaid Debit Cards in EMV and non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	EMV card formats. Our personalization services are technology
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	driven and provide a wide range of card customization options, using advanced processes to personalize (encode, program and emboss with data such as cardholder name and account number) and fulfill cards to individual cardholders. In addition, we provide EMV data script development services for our customers and in certain cases generate PIN numbers and mailers on their behalf. We offer patented card design software, known as MYCA&#x2122;, which provides our customers and their cardholders the ability to design cards on the internet and customize cards with individualized digital images. We also provide consultation and card design services to further assist customers in card customization. Finally, we have the capabilities to provide Trusted Service Manager services, leveraging our existing data connectivity with processors and other customers to offer a trusted, high
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	security solution for facilitating mobile payments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Tamper
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Eviden
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	t Security Packaging Solutions
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We offer specialized and innovative tamper
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	evident security packaging products and services to customers with a Prepaid Debit Card offering that reduce fraud for Prepaid Debit Cards sold through the retail channel. The majority of the tamper
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	evident security packaging we produce is protected by our patents. In certain cases, we also manage the fulfillment of fully
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	completed Prepaid Debit Card packages to retail locations on behalf of our customers utilizing this solution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Instant Card
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Issuance Systems and Services
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We offer Card@Once
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, our proprietary and patented instant card issuance system and services, which provide our card issuing bank customers the ability to issue a completely personalized permanent debit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or credit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	card within the bank branch to individual cardholders upon demand. Our instant issuance system is enabled by cloud
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	based software that securely transfers data from our servers to the card branch to encode
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	either a magnetic stripe or an EMV card,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	personalize
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the card on a desktop
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	output terminal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in a process which is certified by MasterCard and Visa. Our instant issuance system generates both system sales and recurring revenue from software as a service, card personalization and sales of cards and consumables. In addition, we provide instant issuance of debit cards to large financial institutions whereby we provide fully
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	personalized temporary debit cards which are issued to card holders upon opening a new account, and we manage the fulfillment and replenishment of these fully personalized cards directly to thousands of individual bank branches.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Suppliers
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The most important component of our products is the EMV microchip, which we expect to become even more significant as EMV cards comprise an increasing percentage of the cards we ship. While we have developed constructive relationships with our suppliers and, in general, receive a high level of cooperation and support from them, the objective of our procurement strategy is not to depend on any single supplier. We obtain our components from multiple suppliers located in South Korea, France, the United States and Singapore, primarily on a purchase order basis. Our main suppliers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage9"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>

</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of EMV microchips are five leading manufacturers: KONA&nbsp;I&nbsp;Co.&nbsp;Ltd, Smart Packaging Solutions, NXP Semiconductors USA, Inc., Inside Secure and Multos International.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Substantially all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	purchased EMV microchips for the year ended Dec
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ember&nbsp;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	came from these five main suppliers. The other key components for our products are substrates (such as PVC), antennas and inlays which we also source from multiple suppliers. We continuously monitor supply chain risks and evaluate alternative suppliers based on numerous attributes including quality, performance, service, scalability, features, innovation and price.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Customers
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In the United States, we categorize our customers as follows: large issuers, prepaid debit issuers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	program managers and small issuers. Our diverse customer base of over 4,000 direct and indirect customers includes many of the largest issuers of credit and debit cards in the United States and the five largest global managers of Prepaid Debit Card programs. Our top five customers represented approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	31.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% of our net sales for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. Our top five customers in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, who we have been serving for an average of greater than 10&nbsp;years, were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	InComm,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	First Data Corporation,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Barclays
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, Wells Fargo and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	PSCU
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	generally
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	enter into master purchase or service agreements that govern the general terms and conditions of our commercial relationships. We then enter into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	purchase order or other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	short
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	arrangements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	define the prices and the quantities of products to be delivered and services rendered. Usually, our contractual arrangements include neither exclusivity clauses nor commitments from our customers to order any given quantities of products on a medium or long
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	term basis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Production and Services
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our production and services strategy has several key facets. We have a large network of integrated high
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	security facilities that we leverage to balance customer orders, expand the array of products and services available to our customers, provide consistent supply and execute short lead times. Our facilities and operating processes are designed to provide a differentiated level of service to each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	our key customer sets. For example, we have the processes and capabilities to:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We operate approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	498,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	square feet of facilities in the United States, Canada and the United Kingdom, where we focus on Financial Payment Card production and personalization services. See
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Part I, Item 2,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Propert
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	ies&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of this Annual Report on Form 10-K
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for information on the operations of each facility.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We rely on secure ground
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and secure air
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	freight to deliver products to our banking customers. Due to the high
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	security nature of the products we provide to our banking customers, product must be shipped to these customers via a secure method, such as armored vehicle. With respect to customers for whom we fulfill individual and personalized debit and credit cards, we utilize the U.S., Canadian and U.K. postal services to deliver these cards directly to individual cardholders. For other customers, we predominately deliver our products via regular ground and air freight.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	CPI has continued to expand its digital services to issuers focus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	on enabling payments for the growing e-commerce and mobile market place.&nbsp; Our digital services are primarily hosted solutions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	which are designed to scale quickly to efficiently support a growing number of issuers and end users.&nbsp;&nbsp; CPI&#x2019;s e-Services encompass a variety of secure hosted solutions, which enable improved customer service and efficiencies for our customers, including online card re-orders, order status, inventory management, EMV key management, and finished goods fulfillment.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We also offer other innovative mobile services, such as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	CPI Mobile&#x2122;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	where we are able to provide
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	solution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to digitize, encrypt and deliver payment credentials to mobile phones.&nbsp; The platform provides secure provisioning of tokenized credentials to phones
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and is compliant with all the security mechanisms accepted by the payment networks (cloud-based Host Card
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage10"></A>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">

<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">

</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Emulation, Trusted Execution Environment, and hardware secure element).&nbsp; The production environment is PCI-DSS and EMVCo compliant for security, and can support NFC and secure barcode mobile payments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Sales and Marketing
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We market our products and services to national and regional banks, independent community banks, credit unions, managers of prepaid programs, Group Service Providers and card processors. We have approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	field
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	based sales representatives that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	give
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	us a wide geographic reach across North America, Western Europe and Canada. Our sales representatives offer a complete end
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	end solution that incorporates the full spectrum of our products and services from concept to delivery. Our sales and marketing strategy focuses on strengthening our relationships with existing customers, providing a differentiated offer that includes cross
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	selling expanded services. We leverage the strength of our full
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	service offerings to attract new customers. Our marketing efforts focus on the needs of our specific types of customers. By tailoring our marketing strategy to different customer groups, we are able to provide relevant targeted solutions to meet their individual needs. We utilize an array of different marketing communications focused on thought leadership that include industry publications, editorial white papers, conferences and trade shows, print and digital advertisements and educational webinars designed to introduce our existing customers and new customers to innovations in the payments market. Through these efforts, we drive customer retention and satisfaction, and have been able to attract new customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Competition
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The market for products and services in the payment card industry is highly competitive. Some of our competitors possess substantially greater financial, sales and marketing resources than we do and have substantial flexibility in competing with us, including through the use of integrated product offerings and competitive pricing. Competitive factors for our business include product quality, security, service reliability, product line comprehensiveness and integration, timely introduction of new products and features and price. We believe that we compete favorably in each of these categories.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our products and services compete with other card manufacturers and card solutions providers. We believe our primary competitors are Oberthur Technologies&nbsp;S.A., Giesecke&nbsp;&amp; Devrient&nbsp;GmbH, Valid&nbsp;S.A. and Gemalto&nbsp;NV. Certain existing and potential financial institution customers also have the ability to personalize Financial Payment Cards in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	house.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In addition, we compete with customers that offer transaction processing products and services to financial institutions.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Intellectual Property
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We own and control various intellectual property rights, such as patents, trade secrets, confidential information, trademarks, service marks, trade names, copyrights and applications. We are also party to certain patent cross
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	license arrangements with industry participants and may, from time to time, enter into similar commercial agreements should we consider it necessary or beneficial for our business.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We rely on a combination of statutory (copyright, trademark and trade secret) and contractual safeguards for intellectual property protection throughout the world. As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 2015, we had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	27
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	registered U.S. and foreign trademarks, 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	existing U.S. patents, as well as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pending U.S. and foreign patent applications. Our patents have an average remaining maturity of 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.5&nbsp;years, and our trademarks will be due for renewal for additional ten or fifteen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year periods on an ongoing basis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Environmental Protection
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our manufacturing operations are subject to environmental protection regulations, including those governing the emissions of pollutants into the air, wastewater discharges, the use and handling of hazardous substances, waste disposal, the investigation and remediation of soil and groundwater contamination. We are also required to obtain environmental permits from governmental authorities for certain of our operations. We believe that we are in material compliance with environmental requirements and that environmental matters will not have a material adverse effect on our business, although resolution of any item in any particular year or quarter could be material to the results of operations or liquidity for that period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">

</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
