<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 99.35PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_RESULTS_OF_OPERATIONS>
<A NAME="FIS_RESULTS_OF_OPERATIONS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Key Components of Results of Operations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Set forth below is a brief description of key line items of our consolidated statements of operations and comprehensive income.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Net Sales
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Net sales reflect our revenue generated from the sale of products and services. Product net sales include the design and production
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of Financial Payment Cards in contact EMV, d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	nterface EMV, contactless and magnetic stripe formats. We also generate product revenue from the sale of our Card@Once
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	instant issuance systems, Private Label Credit C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ards and retail gift cards. Services net sales include revenue from the personalization and fulfillment of Financial Payment Cards, the provision of tamper
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	evident security packaging, providing fulfillment services to Prepaid Debit Card program managers, and software as a service personalization of instant issuance debit cards. We also generate service revenue from personalizing retail gift cards (primarily in Canada and the United Kingdom) and from click
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	fees generated from our patented MYCA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2122;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	software.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Generally, we recognize net sales related to products upon shipment and services upon the provision of the service, when persuasive evidence of an arrangement exists, delivery has occurred, the fee is fixed or determinable, and collectability is reasonably assured. See &#x201C;&#x2014;Critical Accounting Policies and Estimates&#x2014;Revenue Recognition.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Cost of Sales
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Cost of sales includes the direct and indirect costs of the products we sell and the services that we provide. Product costs include the cost of raw materials, including mic
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	rochip
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s in the case of EMV cards and, additionally,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	RFID assemblies in the case of d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	nterface EMV cards, labor costs, material costs, equipment and facilities costs, operation overhead, depreciation, leases and rental charges and transport costs. Product costs also include desktop card
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	37
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage39"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	personalization terminals in the case of Card@Once
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	instant issuance system sales. Services costs include the cost of labor, raw materials in the case of tamper
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	evident security packaging, and equipment and facilities costs, operation overhead, depreciation, leases and rental charges and transport costs. Cost of sales can be impacted by many factors, including volume, operational efficiencies, promotional activity and employee relations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Gross Profit and Gross Margin
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gross profit consists of our net sales less our cost of sales. Gross margin is gross profit as a percentage of net sales.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Operating Expenses
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Operating expenses are primarily comprised of selling, general and administrative expenses (&#x201C;SG&amp;A&#x201D;) which generally consist of expenses for executive, finance, sales, marketing, legal,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	information technology, customer service,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	human resources and administrative personnel, including payroll, benefits and stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	based compensation expense, and outside legal and other advisory fees. Operating expense also includes depreciation and amortization expense, including the amortization of tangible and intangible assets. We anticipate increases in SG&amp;A as we incur the costs of compliance associated with being a public company, including audit and consulting fees.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Income from Operations and Operating Margin
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Income from operations consists of our gross profit less our operating expenses. Operating margin is income from operations as a percentage of net sales.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Other Income (Expense)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Other income (expense) consists primarily of interest expense and foreign currency gains and losses.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Net Income from Continuing Operations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Net income from continuing operations consists of our income from operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	plus other income or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and provision for income tax
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	es
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	38
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	he years ended December&nbsp;31, 2015

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Net sales for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 increased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	113.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	43.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	374.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	261.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014. The increase in net sales during 2015 was due to growth in our U.S. Debit and Credit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	segment and U.S. Prepaid Debit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	egment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	net sales of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	72.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	11.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	respectively,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	offset by a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% decline in our U.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	K
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Limited
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	net sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	compared to 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Debit and Credit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Net sales for the U.S. Debit and Credit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 increased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	110.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	72.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	263.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	153.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014. The increase in net sales was driven by an increase in EMV related revenue of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	79.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	nd an increase in net sales of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	57.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	from the EFT Source business acquired in September 2014, partially offset by a decrease in magnetic stripe card sales of $25.5 mil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lion.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The increase in EMV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	revenue of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	79.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million was driven by our card issuing bank customers or end
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	users adopting EMV technology for debit and credit cards
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	as the conversion of the United States market from magnetic stripe
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	inancial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	P
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ayment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ards to EMV cards continues
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. For the year ended December
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	31, 2015, we sold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	154.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million EMV cards at an average selling price of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	0.94
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per card compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	63.8&nbsp;million EMV cards
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	at an average selling price of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.04
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per card for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Of t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$57.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	increase in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	revenue related to our EFT Source business, $45.6 million was attributed to a full year of sales being reflected in our 2015 results, while in 2014, sales were included from the September 2, 2014 acquisition date through December 31, 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;The remaining growth of $11.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was driven by increased customer activity in our card personalization and fulfillment services, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	continued growth of Card@Once
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. The $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	25.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million decline in magnetic stripe revenue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	driven by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the ongoing shift of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	our card issuing bank customers from magnetic stripe cards to EMV cards.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Prepaid Debit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Net sales for the U.S. Prepaid Debit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	11.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	65.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	59.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	increase was driven by our largest customer for this segment refreshing its packaging designs in the first quarter of 2015.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	This customer activity produced a significant increase in net sales in the first quarter of 2015, with buying patterns returning to normal levels for the remainder of the year ended December 31, 2015.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.K. Limited
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 de
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	creased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	0.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	34.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	35.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	Fluctuations in the exchange rate between the United States dollar and the British Pound resulted in a reduction to revenues for the year ended December 31, 2015 of $2.5 million over the previous year.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	&nbsp;

	Other
</FONT>

	Net sales in Other decreased $6.5 million, or 27.1%, from 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5

	&nbsp;

	Net sales for our Canada operations decreased $2.4 million for the year ended December 31, 2015 compared to 2014, driven by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	fluctuations in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	foreign currency exchange rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	Fluctuations in the exchange rate between the United States dollar and the Canadian Dollar resulted in a reduction to revenues for the year ended December 31, 2015 of $2.1 million over the previous year.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;Our Petersfield U.K. operation was shut down in August 2015 which primarily drove the remaining $4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million decrease in Other net sales year over year.

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.28%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:2PT DOUBLE #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Cost of sales for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 increased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	59.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	32.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	238.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	179.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Debit and Credit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Cost of sales for the U.S. Debit and Credit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 increased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	63.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	60.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	166.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	103.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million for the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31, 2014. The increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in cost of sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	primarily attributable to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	26.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million increase in technology materials (primarily EMV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	microchips
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	), a $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	12.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million increase in other materials, a $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	12.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million increase in overhead, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	n
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million increase in labor and benefits costs and a $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million increase in depreciation and amortization.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	26.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million increase in technology materials was driven by the increased number of EMV cards
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	sold,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	as noted above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and is a direct result of U.S. card issuing banks upgrading debit and credit cards to EMV which include an integrated circuit chip assembly and in certain cases may also include an RFID inlay assembly. The $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	12.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in other materials and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	12.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million increase in overhead expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	driven primarily by the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	continued integration of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	EFT Source
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to a lesser extent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	by our new secure EMV production and card services facility that became operational in 2014. The $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million increase in labor costs was driven by the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	additional employees we added from the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	acquisition of EFT Source and additional labor costs associated with the production of EMV cards
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	which are more complex than non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	EMV cards and therefore have a higher labor component. Finally, increases in depreciation and amortization expense were driven by the EFT Source acquisition and the new secure EMV production and card services facility noted above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Prepaid Debit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Cost of sales for the U.S. Prepaid Debit segment for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	creased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	39.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	38.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The increase in cost of sales was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	related to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the increased level of net sales referenced above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	partially offset
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	more efficient
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	U.K. Limited
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Cost of sales for the U.K. Limited segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	de
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	creased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	25.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million compared to $
</FONT>

	27.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The decrease in cost of sales was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	driven by foreign currency exchange rate flu
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ctuations, as discussed above

	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Other
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Other cost of sales decreased by $6.5 million, or 31.1%, to $14.4 million compared to $20.9 million in 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;The decrease was primarily related to a decrease of $4.1 million in cost of sales related to our Petersfield, U.K. operation, shut down in August 2015, as discussed above and decreases related to our Canada operation of $2.2 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;The decrease in cost of sales in Canada was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	driven by foreign currency exchange rate flu
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ctuations, discussed above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.72%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.08%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;
</P>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gross profit for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 increased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	54.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	66.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	135.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	81.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014. Gross profit margin for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 increased to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	36.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	31.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Debit and Credit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gross profit for the U.S. Debit and Credit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 increased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	47.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	96.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	97.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	49.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014. Increases in gross profit were driven by a $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	30.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million contribution from increased EMV volumes (net of reduced gross profit from non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	EMV cards) and a $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	17.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million increase from the EFT Source acquisition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;EFT Source gross profit increased $16.2 million due to EFT Source results being reflected for the full year in 2015 and from September 2, 2014 through December 31, 2014 during the prior year, with the remaining increase of $1.2 million due to year over year growth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gross profit margin for the U.S. Debit and Credit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	36.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	32.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	due to the continued conversion of the United States market to EMV cards, discussed above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Prepaid Debit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gross profit for the U.S. Prepaid Debit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	25.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	26.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	21.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014. Gross profit margin for the U.S. Prepaid Debit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 increased to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	40.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	35.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in gross profit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and gross profit margin were primarily driven by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	net sales referenced above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the improved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	operating
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	efficiencies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	this segment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.K. Limited
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gross profit for the U.K. Limited segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 increased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	11.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	9.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014. Gross profit margin for the U.K. Limited segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 increased to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	26.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	23.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The increase was driven by the effect of foreign currency exchange rate fluctuations discussed above, and to a lesser extent, more efficient production
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gross profit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in Other increased 4.0% in 2015 to $3.2 million from $3.1 million in 2014, and was primarily related to the Canada operation.
</FONT>
</P>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:05.74%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Operating expenses for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 increased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	20.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	44.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%, to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	68.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	47.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014. The increase in operating expenses was driven primarily by a $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	10.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million increase in the U.S. Debit and Credit segment and a $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	9.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million increase in our corporate expenses.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	10.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million increase in the U.S. Debit an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	d Credit segment was driven by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million increase related to the EFT Source acquisition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and the remaining increase was primarily attributable to additional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	SG&amp;A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	expenses related to the elevated levels of segment net sales discussed above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Other operating expenses includes an increase of $4.2 million in connection with the settlement of our obligation under the phantom stock plan in conjunction with our IPO, $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million in increased depreciation and amortization expense, $1.0 million related to accrued performance bonuses in connection with the EFT Source acquisition, a restructuring charge of $0.7 million related to the closure of our Petersfield U.K. facility, $0.4 million of transaction costs, and a $1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	increase in corporate salaries, consulting fees, legal, and other SG&amp;A expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Excluding charges of $8.7 million and $4.5 million for the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014, respectively, related to our phantom stock plan, $0.4 million of transaction costs for the year ended December 31, 2015 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#FF0000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.0 million of accrued performance bonus charges in connection with the EFT Source acquisition in the year ended December 31, 2015, operating expenses for the year ended December 31, 2015 increased $15.2 million, or 35.6%, compared to the year ended December 31, 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	&nbsp;

	Income from operations for the year ended December 31, 2015 increased $33.2 million, or 96.4%, to $67.7 million compared to $34.5 million for the year ended December 31, 2014. Operating margins for the year ended December 31, 2015 increased to 18.1% compared to 13.2% for the year ended December 31, 2014.

	Our net sales grew by 6.5% in the fourth quarter 2015 compared to same quarter in 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;Net sales for our U.S. Debit &amp; Credit segment grew by 11.2% in the fourth quarter of 2015 compared to fourth quarter of 2014 due to the continued conversion of

	C

	ards from magnetic stripe to EMV

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	chip technology
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Net sales for our U.S. Prepaid Debit segment increased by 1.4% in the fourth quarter of 2015 compared to the fourth quarter of 2014 as growth in our retail prepaid sales across the customer base was offset by significant fourth quarter 2014 product launches and refreshes for two large customers, which were not replicated in the fourth quarter of 2015.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>

</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Adjusted EBITDA m
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	argins
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in the fourth quarter of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015 continued to improve over
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the fourth quarter of 2014 due to increased operating leverage driven by increased net sales. The increases in net sales have been primarily driven by an increase in the shipment of EMV Financial Payment Cards, which generally have higher selling prices and gross profits than the non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	EMV Financial Payment Cards that they are replacing.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<DIV STYLE="FLOAT:LEFT">
</DIV>
	64,636
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:06.40%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:3PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">
<DIV STYLE="FLOAT:LEFT">
</DIV>
	32.9
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.26%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Net sales for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $64.6&nbsp;million, or 32.9%, to $261.0&nbsp;million compared to $196.4&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. The increase in net sales during 2014 was due to growth in net sales of 67.0% and 5.8% in our U.S. Debit and Credit segment and U.K. Limited segment, respectively, offset by a 10.1% decline in our U.S. Prepaid Debit segment as compared to 2013.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Debit and Credit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Net sales for the U.S. Debit and Credit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $61.4&nbsp;million, or 67.0%, to $153.0&nbsp;million compared to $91.6&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. The increase in net sales was driven by an increase in EMV related revenue of $58.2&nbsp;million, a $14.7&nbsp;million increase in card services revenue, a $7.4&nbsp;million increase in instant issuance revenue and various other items, offset by declines in magnetic stripe card revenue of $12.0&nbsp;million and contactless card revenue of $2.4&nbsp;million. The increase in EMV revenue of $58.2&nbsp;million was driven by our card issuing bank customers or end
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	users adopting EMV technology for debit and credit cards. For the year ended December
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	31, 2014, we sold 62.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million EMV cards (ap
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	proximately 5.7% of which were dual-i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	nterface EMV) at a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	n average selling price of $1.04
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per card compared to 5.6&nbsp;million EMV cards (app
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	roximately 12.7% of which were dual-i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	nterface EMV) at an average selling price of $1.28 per card for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. The increase in card services revenue of $14.7&nbsp;million was driven primarily by the impact of our acquisition of EFT Source on September&nbsp;2, 2014, including new personalization customers coming onto our acquired service platform and services related to debit and credit cards reissued in response to data breaches at large U.S. retailers. Likewise, the $7.4&nbsp;million growth in instant issuance revenue was also driven by the acquisition of EFT Source, as well as continued growth of Card@Once
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in 2014. The $12.0&nbsp;million decline in magnetic stripe revenue and the $2.4&nbsp;million decline in contactless revenue were primarily driven by our card issuing bank customers upgrading from magnetic stripe cards and contactless cards to EMV cards.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Prepaid Debit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Net sales for the U.S. Prepaid Debit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 decreased $6.6&nbsp;million, or 10.1%, to $59.3&nbsp;million compared to $65.9&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. The decline was driven primarily by our largest customer for this segment drawing down inventory levels.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.K. Limited
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Net sales for the U.K. Limited segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $1.9&nbsp;million, or 5.8%, to $35.2&nbsp;million compared to $33.2&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. The increase in sales was primarily driven by a $1.9&nbsp;million increase in retail gift and loyalty card product and services revenue.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.06%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

	31.0
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.76%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Cost of sales for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $42.4&nbsp;million, or 31.0%, to $179.3&nbsp;million compared to $136.9&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Debit and Credit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Cost of sales for the U.S. Debit and Credit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $37.0&nbsp;million, or 55.5%, to $103.6&nbsp;million compared to $66.6&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. The increases in cost of sales were driven by a $21.2&nbsp;million increase in technology materials (primarily EMV chip assemblies), a $4.4&nbsp;million increase in other materials, a $6.8&nbsp;million increase in overhead, a $5.3&nbsp;million increase in labor and benefits costs and a $1.1&nbsp;million increase in depreciation and amortization.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The $21.2&nbsp;million increase in technology materials was driven by the increased number of EMV cards shipped as noted above and is a direct result of U.S. card issuing banks upgrading debit and credit cards to EMV which include an integrated circuit chip assembly and in certain cases may also include an RFID inlay assembly. The $6.8&nbsp;million increase in overhead expenses and the $4.4&nbsp;million increase in other materials
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	driven primarily by the EFT Source acquisition and to a lesser extent by our new secure EMV production and card services facility that became operational in 2014. The $5.3&nbsp;million increase in labor costs was driven by the acquisition of EFT Source and additional labor costs associated with the production of EMV cards which are more complex than non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	EMV cards and therefore have a higher labor component. Finally, increases in depreciation and amortization expense were driven by the EFT Source acquisition and the new secure EMV production and card services facility noted above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Prepaid Debit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Cost of sales for the U.S. Prepaid Debit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 decreased $4.8&nbsp;million, or 11.1%, to $38.2&nbsp;million compared to $43.0&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. The decrease in cost of sales was driven by the reduced level of net sales referenced above and more efficient
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, partially offset by increased depreciation from elevated levels of capital investment during 2013 and 2014 to expand our tamper
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	evident security packaging capacity.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.K. Limited
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Cost of sales for the U.K. Limited segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $1.4&nbsp;million, or 5.5%, to $27.0&nbsp;million compared to $25.6&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Increases in cost of sales was driven by a $0.9&nbsp;million increase in labor costs and a $0.7&nbsp;million increase in materials costs which were partially offset by a decrease in depreciation and amortization. The increase in labor and material expense was driven by the increased level of net sales in 2014, as compared to 2013, noted above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	47
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:00.90%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gross profit for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $22.2&nbsp;million, or 37.4%, to $81.7&nbsp;million compared to $59.5&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Gross profit margin for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased to 31.3% compared to 30.3% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Debit and Credit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gross profit for the U.S. Debit and Credit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $24.4&nbsp;million, or 97.5%, to $49.5&nbsp;million compared to $25.0&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Gross profit margin for the U.S. Debit and Credit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased to 32.3% compared to 27.3% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Increases in gross profit were driven by a $14.0&nbsp;million contribution from increased EMV volumes (net of reduced gross profit from non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	EMV cards) and a $10.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million increase from the EFT Source acquisition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Prepaid Debit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gross profit for the U.S. Prepaid Debit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 decreased $1.9&nbsp;million, or 8.1%, to $21.0&nbsp;million compared to $22.9&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. The decrease in gross profit was primarily driven by a reduced level of net sales referenced above, partially offset by the improved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	operating
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	efficiencies at this segment. Gross profit margin for the U.S. Prepaid Debit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased to 35.5% compared to 34.7% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.K. Limited
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gross profit for the U.K. Limited segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $0.5&nbsp;million, or 6.6%, to $8.2&nbsp;million compared to $7.7&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Gross profit margin for the U.K. Limited segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased to 23.2% compared to 23.1% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Increases in gross profit were driven by increased retail gift and loyalty card product and services revenue.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage50"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Operating expenses for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $13.9&nbsp;million, or 41.7%, to $47.2&nbsp;million compared to $33.3&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Excluding charges of $4.5&nbsp;million and $0.6&nbsp;million, in 2014 and 2013, respectively, related to our phantom stock plan and investment banking, advisory and related professional fees in 2014 of $2.1&nbsp;million, operating expenses for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $7.9&nbsp;million, or 24.1%.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The increase in operating expenses was driven primarily by a $5.3&nbsp;million increase in the U.S. Debit and Credit segment and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million increase in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	expenses. The $5.3&nbsp;million increase in the U.S. Debit and Credit segment was driven by a $4.1&nbsp;million increase related to the EFT Source acquisition and the remaining increase was primarily attributable to additional selling, salary and other expenses related to the elevated levels of segment net sales discussed above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The $8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million increase in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	expenses was primarily driven by the $4.5&nbsp;million charge related to our phantom stock plan, $2.1&nbsp;million related to investment banking, advisory and related professional fees, and a $1.3&nbsp;million increase in corporate salaries and management incentive payments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Income from operations for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $8.3&nbsp;million, or 31.8%, to $34.5&nbsp;million compared to $26.2&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Excluding the 2014 and 2013 charges of $4.5&nbsp;million and $0.6&nbsp;million, respectively, related to our phantom stock plan and investment banking, advisory and related professional fees in 2014 of $2.1&nbsp;million, income from operations for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $14.3&nbsp;million, or 53.3%, relative to the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Operating margins for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 decreased to 13.2% compared to 13.3% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Excluding the 2014 and 2013 charges related to our phantom stock plan and investment banking, advisory and related professional fees discussed above, operating margins for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased to 15.7% compared to 13.6% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Debit and Credit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Income from operations for the U.S. Debit and Credit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased $19.1&nbsp;million, or 124.7%, to $34.4&nbsp;million compared to $15.3&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Operating margins for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 increased to 22.5% compared to 16.7% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	U.S. Prepaid Debit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Income from operations for the U.S. Prepaid Debit segment for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 decreased $2.2&nbsp;million, or 12.0%, to $15.8&nbsp;million compared to $17.9&nbsp;million for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013. Operating margins for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 decreased to 26.6% compared to 27.2% for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
