	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	reviews, estimated undiscounted future cash flows associated with these assets or asset groups are compared with their carrying value to determine if a write
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	down to fair value is required. Based upon the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s analysis, it concluded that there was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	impairment of its long
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lived assets for the years ended December
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	31, 2015, 2014, and 2013.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Goodwill and Intangible Assets
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Goodwill and other indefinite
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lived intangible assets are not amortized, but instead are tested for impairment at least annually on October
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1. Testing is done in accordance with ASC 350,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Intangibles&#x2014;Goodwill and Other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and ASC 820,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Fair Value Measurements and Disclosures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. For impairment evaluations, the Company or a third
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	party firm first makes a qualitative assessment with respect to both goodwill and other indefinite
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lived intangibles. In the case of goodwill, if it is more likely than not that a reporting unit&#x2019;s fair value is less than its carrying value, the fair value of the reporting unit is compared to its respective carrying amount. If the carrying value of a reporting unit were to exceed its fair value, any excess of the carrying amount over the fair value would be charged to operations as an impairment loss. With respect to indefinite
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lived intangible assets, if it is more
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	likely
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	not that the fair value of an indefinite
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lived intangible asset is less than its carrying value, any excess of the carrying value over the fair value of the indefinite
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lived intangible asset is also charged to operations as an impairment loss.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	For the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2015, 2014 and 2013 the Company determined goodwill and other indefinite
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lived intangibles were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	impaired. As of December&nbsp;31, 2015 and 2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$6,352
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$24,377
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of goodwill was tax
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	deductible, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Acquired finite
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lived intangible assets are amortized on a straight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	line basis over the estimated useful lives of the assets.&nbsp;&nbsp;Acquired indefinite
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lived intangible assets related to trademarks are capitalized and subject to impairment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Income Taxes
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company accounts for income taxes using an asset and liability approach to financial accounting and reporting for income taxes. Deferred income tax assets and liabilities are computed annually for differences between the financial statement and tax bases of assets and liabilities that will result in taxable or deductible amounts in the future based on enacted tax laws and rates applicable to the periods in which the differences are expected to affect taxable income.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	The Company has deferred tax assets and liabilities and maintains valuation allowances where it is more likely than not that all or a portion of deferred tax assets will not be realized. To the extent the Company determines that it will not realize the benefit of some or all of its deferred tax assets, then these deferred tax assets will be adjusted through the Company&#x2019;s provision for income taxes in the period in which this determination is made.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	The Company recognizes the tax benefits from uncertain tax positions only when it is more likely than not, based on the technical merits of the position, that the tax position will be sustained upon examination, including the resolution of any related appeals or litigation. The tax benefits recognized in the consolidated financial statements from such a position are measured as the largest benefit that has a greater than fifty percent likelihood of being realized upon ultimate resolution.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company recognizes interest and penalties related to unrecognized tax benefits as a component of provision for income taxes.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Based Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company accounts for stock-based compensation pursuant to ASC 718,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Share-Based Payments.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	All stock-based compensation to employees is required to be measured at fair value and expensed, net of forfeitures, over the requisite service period. The Company recognizes compensation expense on awards on a straight-line basis over the vesting period for each tranche of an award. Refer to Note&nbsp;17 &#x201C;Stock Option Plans&#x201D; for additional discussion regarding details of the Company's stock-based compensation plans.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Advertising Costs
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Advertising costs are expensed as incurred. Advertising costs during the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2015, 2014 and 2013 were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$764
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$392
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$144
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>

</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">

	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Use of Estimates
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Management uses estimates and assumptions relating to the reporting of assets and liabilities in its preparation of the Consolidated Financial Statements. Significant items subject to such estimates and assumptions include the carrying amount of property and equipment, goodwill and intangible assets, inventories, deferred taxes, and valuation of stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	based awards. Actual results could differ from those estimates.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Foreign Currency Translation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Financial statements of foreign subsidiaries that use local currencies as their functional currency are translated into U.S. dollars using the exchange rate at each balance sheet date for assets and liabilities and the weighted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	average exchange rate for each reporting period for revenues, expenses, gains and losses. Translation adjustments are recorded as a component of Other Comprehensive Income in the accompanying financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Foreign currency transaction gains and losses resulting from the process of re
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	measurement are recorded in &#x201C;Foreign currency gain (loss)&#x201D; in the accompanying Consolidated Statements of Operations and Comprehensive Income. For the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2015, 2014 and 2013 there were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$59
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$(124)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$(142)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of such foreign currency gains (losses), respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Recently Issued Accounting Pronouncements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 14PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Financial Accounting Standards Board (&#x201C;FASB&#x201D;) issued Accounting Standards Update (&#x201C;ASU&#x201D;) 2014-09,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Revenue from Contracts with Customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, in May 2014. ASU 2014-09 requires an entity to recognize revenue to depict the transfer of promised goods or services to customers in an amount that reflects the consideration to which the entity expects to be entitled in exchange for those goods or services. An entity should also disclose sufficient quantitative and qualitative information to enable users of financial statements to understand the nature, amount, timing and uncertainty of revenue and cash flows arising from contracts with customers. In July 2015, the FASB deferred the effective date to annual reporting periods beginning after December 15, 2017, and interim reporting periods within those periods.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company plans to implement the provisions of ASU 2014-09 as of January 1, 2018. The Company is in the process of determining the method of adoption and assessing the impact of ASU 2014-09 on its results of operations, financial position and consolidated financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 14PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The FASB issued ASU 2015-03,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Simplifying the Presentation of Debt Issuance Costs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, in April 2015. ASU 2015-03 requires debt issuance costs related to a recognized debt liability to be presented on the balance sheet as a direct deduction from the debt liability, similar to the presentation of debt discounts. The new standard is effective for public entities annual reporting periods beginning after December 15, 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;Early adoption of the amendments in ASU 2015-03 is permitted for financial statements that have not been previously issued.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company adopted this standard in 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;Accordingly, the Company recorded a reduction of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$8,041
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to &#x201C;Long-term debt&#x201D; in the Company&#x2019;s Consolidated Balance Sheet as of December 31, 2015, and reclassified
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$614
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	from &#x201C;Capitalized loan fees&#x201D; to &#x201C;Long-term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	debt&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in the Company&#x2019;s Consolidated Balance Sheet as of December 31, 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 14PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In November 2015, the FASB issued ASU No. 2015-17,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Balance Sheet Classification of Deferred Taxes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;ASU 2015-17 requires that deferred tax liabilities and assets be classified as noncurrent in a classified statement of financial position. The new standard is effective for public entities&#x2019; annual reporting periods beginning after December 15, 2016, with early adoption permitted, and the guidance may be applied either prospectively or retrospectively. The Company has elected to early adopt this standard in 2015 prospectively.&nbsp;&nbsp;The impact to the Company&#x2019;s Consolidated Balance Sheet was immaterial.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The FASB issued ASU 2015-11, Inventory&#x2014;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Simplifying the Measurement of Inventory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, in July 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;ASU 2015-11 requires that inventory be measured at the lower of cost or net realizable value.&nbsp;&nbsp;Net realizable value is the estimated selling price in the ordinary course of business, less reasonably predictable costs of completion, disposal, and transportation.&nbsp;&nbsp;The new standard is effective for public entities&#x2019; annual reporting periods beginning after December 15, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company plans to implement the provisions of ASU 2015-11 as of January 1, 2017. The Company is in the process of assessing the impact of ASU 2015-11 on its results of operations, financial position and consolidated financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage71"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In February 2016, the FASB issued ASU 2016-02,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Leases
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, which provides guidance for accounting for leases. The new guidance requires companies to recognize the assets and liabilities for the rights and obligations created by leased assets.&nbsp;&nbsp;ASU 2016-02 is effective for annual and interim periods beginning after December 15, 2018 (the Company&#x2019;s fiscal year 2019) with early adoption permitted. The new standard is required to be adopted using a modified retrospective approach. The Company is in the process of assessing the impact of ASU 2016-02 on its results of operations, financial position and consolidated financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3. EFT Source Acquisition
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	On September&nbsp;2, 2014, CPI Card Group&nbsp;Inc., through its wholly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	owned subsidiary, CPI Acquisition,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Inc., purchased EFT Source,&nbsp;Inc. (&#x201C;EFT Source&#x201D;) headquartered in Nashville, Tennessee. EFT Source is a provider of Financial Payment Card services such as data personalization and fulfillment in the U.S. market. The primary reasons for the acquisition were to extend the Company&#x2019;s existing product lines, expand its markets and increase revenue.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Purchase Price
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Total consideration for the EFT Acquisition of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$68,859
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was paid in cash of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$54,859
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, a note payable to the previous owners of EFT Source, payable on September 2, 2016 (&#x201C;Sellers Note&#x201D;) of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$9,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and the issuance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$5,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of CPI Card Group&nbsp;Inc. preferred and common stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Allocation of Purchase Price
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The EFT Acquisition was accounted for in accordance with ASC 805,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Business Combinations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. As such, the acquired assets and assumed liabilities have been recorded at their estimated acquisition date fair values.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The allocation of purchase price to the assets acquired and liabilities assumed at the EFT Acquisition date is presented below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_23"></A>

<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<SUP STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	(a)
</SUP>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Amounts primarily include intangible assets related to customer relationships. At September&nbsp;2, 2014, the weighted average useful life of EFT Source customer relationships was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;years.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The fair value of the intangible assets acquired was primarily determined based upon the present value of expected future cash flows, utilizing a risk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	adjusted discount rate. The customer relationships were valued based on a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	multi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	period excess earnings approach.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	multi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	period excess earnings approach
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	measures an asset&#x2019;s value as the present value of cash flows generated by the asset adjusted for contributory charges for other assets which contribute to the cash flows. The non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	compete agreements were valued based on a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	with and without
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	approach. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	with and without
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	method measures an asset value by estimating the difference in cash flows generated by the business with the asset in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	use versus without the asset. The difference in cash flows is attributable to incremental earnings or cost savings associated with the asset. The trademark and trade names were valued based on a &#x201C;relief from royalty&#x201D; approach. The &#x201C;relief from royalty&#x201D; method is based on the premise that a third party would be willing to pay a royalty to use the trade name or trademark asset owned by the subject company. The projected royalties are converted into their present value equivalents through the application of a risk adjusted discount rate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage72"></A>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">

	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company recorded the excess of the aggregate purchase price over the estimated fair values of the identifiable assets acquired as goodwill, which is not deductible for tax purposes.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The goodwill of $33,619 related to the EFT Acquisition, is attributable to current and future market share and assembled workforce,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The assets and liabilities assumed in the acquisition and the results of EFT Source operations were included in the Company&#x2019;s Consolidated Financial Statements as of September&nbsp;2, 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Pro Forma Information
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The following unaudited pro forma consolidated operating results give effect to the EFT Acquisition as if it had been completed on January&nbsp;1, 2013. These pro forma amounts are not necessarily indicative of the operating results that would have occurred if these transactions had occurred on such date. The pro forma adjustments are based on certain assumptions that the Company considers to be reasonable.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s Consolidated Statement of Operations and Comprehensive Income for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 includes revenue and net income from operations of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$21,999
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$4,446
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	respectively, attributable to EFT Source.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4. Discontinued Operation and Disposition
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	On January&nbsp;12, 2015, the Company sold its Nevada non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	secure operation under an asset purchase agreement for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$5,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in cash. The Nevada operation was primarily engaged in the design, production, data personalization, packaging and daily fulfillment of retail gift and loyalty cards for customers in the United States and was not certified by any of the Payment Card Brands.&nbsp;&nbsp;The net carrying values of the assets classified as a discontinued operation include inventory and plant, equipment and leasehold improvements of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$3,129
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,910
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	respectively.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company recognized a gain on the sale of discontinued operations of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$208
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, which is included in &#x201C;Gain on sale of a discontinued operation&#x201D;, net of an income tax benefit of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	247
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in the Company&#x2019;s Consolidated Statement of Operations and Comprehensive Income.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2015, 2014 and 2013, the Nevada operation recognized losses of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$606
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,670
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,612
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively, included in &#x201C;Loss from a discontinued operation&#x201D;, net of income tax benefits of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$404
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1,421
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1,398
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in the Company&#x2019;s Consolidated Statements of Operations and Comprehensive Income.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	After the Nevada Sale, CPI retained no continuing involvement in the Nevada operations other than a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	180
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;day transition of services agreement, which expired on July 11, 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;As a result of the Nevada Sale, the Company expects to take a tax deduction of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$32,128
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	related to the tax deductible goodwill and intangible assets of the Nevada operations, of which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$4,190
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the tax deductible goodwill resulted in the recognition of an income tax benefit of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1,510
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during the year ended December 31, 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company completed its evaluation of the carrying value of goodwill as of October&nbsp;1, 2015 and 2014 and determined there was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	impairment to the recorded value of goodwill. In order to identify potential impairments, CPI compared the fair value of its reporting units with their carrying amounts, including goodwill. As the fair value of the reporting units exceeded their carrying amounts, the Company was not required to complete the second step of the process which would measure the amount of any impairment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	CPI&#x2019;s intangible assets consist of customer relationships, technology and software, non-compete agreements, favorable leases and trademarks. Total intangible assets are being amortized over a weighted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	average useful life of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years. Intangible amortization expense totaled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$4,577
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,893
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,035
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, for the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2015, 2014 and 2013, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8. Fair Value of Financial Instruments
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Fair value is defined as the price that would be received to sell an asset or paid to transfer a liability in an orderly transaction between market participants at the measurement date (exit price). In determining fair value, the Company utilizes a fair value hierarchy that prioritizes the inputs to valuation techniques used to measure fair value into three broad levels. The following is a brief description of those three levels:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Level&nbsp;1&#x2014;Unadjusted quoted prices in active markets for identical assets or liabilities accessible to the reporting entity at the measurement date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Level&nbsp;2&#x2014;Inputs, other than quoted prices included in Level&nbsp;1 inputs that are observable for the asset or liability, either directly or indirectly, for substantially the full term of the asset or liability.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Level&nbsp;3&#x2014;Unobservable inputs for the asset or liability used to measure fair value to the extent that observable inputs are not available, thereby allowing for situations in which there is little, if any, market activity for the asset or liability at the measurement date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s financial assets and liabilities subject to fair value measurements and the necessary disclosures are as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The fair value measurements associated with the EFT Acquisition are based on significant unobservable Level 3 inputs,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	which require significant management judgment and estimation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(see Note&nbsp;3 &#x201C;EFT Source Acquisition&#x201D; for additional information). A discount rate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	11.9%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was utilized in determining the fair value of acquired customer relationship intangible assets related to the EFT Acquisition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:18PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	The carrying amounts for cash and cash equivalents approximate fair value due to their short maturities. The aggregate fair value of the Company's First Lien Term Loan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	based on bank quotes.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	The fair value of the Sellers&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	&nbsp;N
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	ote approximates its carrying value as market interest rates have not changed signi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	ficantly from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	date of issuance.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The carrying value of the Senior Term Loan dated September 2, 2014 on December 31, 2014, approximates the fair value based on the Company&#x2019;s floating rate note which did not change significantly from the amended and restated Credit Agreement of September&nbsp;2, 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9. Related
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Party Transactions
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company leases its operating facility in Indiana from an entity that is owned by a stockholder, who was a member of the Company&#x2019;s Board of Directors until August 7, 2015. The lease expires in January 2018 and requires the Company to pay property taxes, insurance and normal maintenance costs. The Company paid rent of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$108
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	from January 1, 2015 through August 7, 2015, the date on which the former member of the Company&#x2019;s Board of Directors resigned, and was therefore no longer considered a related party.&nbsp;&nbsp;During each of the years ended December 31, 2014 and 2013, the Company paid rent of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$175
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In conjunction with certain officer and non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	officer Company employees acquiring Series A Preferred and Common Stock during 2013 and 2012, the Company obtained notes receivable from the employees that were paid in full on August 17, 2015 and are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	longer outstanding as of December 31, 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;See Note&nbsp;13 &#x201C;Stockholders&#x2019; Equity&#x201D; for further discussion.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">

	300,000
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 16.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<SUP STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:8PT;;">
	(b)
</SUP>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:2PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:2PT;WIDTH:2PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Interest rate on December 31, 2014
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#333333;">
	First Lien Credit Facility
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	On August&nbsp;17, 2015, the Company entered into the First Lien Credit Facility with a syndicate of lenders providing for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	$435,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	First Lien Term Loan and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	$40,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	Revolving Credit Facility. The First Lien Term Loan and the Revolving Credit Facility have maturity dates of August&nbsp;17, 2022 and August&nbsp;17, 2020, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	The First Lien Credit Facility is secured by a first-priority security interest in substantially all of the Company's assets constituting equipment, inventory, receivables, cash and other tangible and intangible property.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	Interest rates under the First Lien Credit Facility are based, at the Company's election, on a Eurodollar rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	, subject to an interest rate floor of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	1.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	plus a margin of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	4.50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	or a base rate plus a margin of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	3.50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	Letters of credit are subject to a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	0.125%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	fronting fee payable to the issuing bank and a fee payable to the revolving lenders equal to the margin applicable to Eurodollar revolving loans. In addition, the Company is required to pay an unused commitment fee ranging from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	0.375%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	per annum to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	0.50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	per annum of the average unused portion of the revolving commitments. The unused commitment fee is determined on the basis of a grid that results in a lower unused commitment fee as the Company's total net leverage ratio declines.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	The First Lien Credit Facility contains customary nonfinancial covenants, including among other things, restrictions on indebtedness, issuance of liens, investments, dividends, redemptions and other distributions to equity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage76"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#PMTS-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	holders, asset sales, certain mergers or consolidations, sales, transfers, leases or dispositions of substantially all of the Company's assets and affiliate transactions. The First Lien Credit Facility also requires prepayment in advance of the maturity date upon the occurrence of certain customary events, including the completion of a qualified initial public offering, and based on an annual Excess Cash Flow calculation, pursuant to the terms of the agreement, beginning as of the year ended December 31, 2016, with any payments due after the issuance of the Company&#x2019;s annual financial statements in 2017. The First Lien Credit Facility also contains a requirement that, as of the last day of any fiscal quarter, if the amount the Company has drawn under the Revolving Credit Facility is greater than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	of the aggregate principal amount of all commitments of the lenders thereunder, the Company maintain a first lien net leverage not in excess of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	7.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	times.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	In accordance with the terms of the First Lien Credit Facility, the Company repaid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	$112,500
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	of the First Lien Term Loan on October&nbsp;15, 2015 in conjunction with the completion of its initial public offering ("IPO"), and an additional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	$10,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	during the fourth quarter of 2015. See Note 1 &#x201C;Business&#x201D;.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company recognized additional interest expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	$4,687
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	during the year ended December 31, 2015 related to accelerated amortization of deferred financing costs and discount in connection with these repayments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 2015, the Company did
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	have any outstanding amounts under the Revolving Credit Facility.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#333333;">
	Senior Term Loan dated September&nbsp;2, 2014
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	At December&nbsp;31, 2015, there were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	amounts outstanding on the Senior Term Loan dated November&nbsp;8, 2012, and amended September&nbsp;2, 2014, and the related revolver with a maturity of September&nbsp;30, 2016. The outstanding balance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	$158,420
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	on the Senior Term Loan was repaid in full on August&nbsp;17, 2015 using a portion of the proceeds from the new $435,000 First Lien Term Loan. In conjunction with the repayment of the Senior Term Loan, the Company recognized a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	$703
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	loss on early extinguishment related to the unamortized deferred financing costs and discount on the Senior Term Loan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in &#x201C;Loss on debt modification and early extinguishment&#x201D; in the Consolidated Statement of Operations and Comprehensive Income
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company accounted for the debt refinancing in accordance with ASC 470
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	50
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	40
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Modifications and Exchanges.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	In conjunction with the Company&#x2019;s initial refinancing of Senior Term Loan on September 2, 2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Company recognized a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$476
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	loss on extinguishment reflected in &#x201C;Loss on debt modification and early extinguishment&#x201D; in the Consolidated Statement of Operations and Comprehensive Income.&nbsp;&nbsp;The primary purpose of this refinancing was to finance the cash portion of the acquisition consideration of EFT Source.&nbsp;&nbsp;Refer to Note 3 &#x201C;EFT Source Acquisition&#x201D; for additional information.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#333333;">
	Sellers Note
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	The Company entered into a subordinated, unsecured promissory note for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	$9,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	with certain sellers of EFT Source as part of the EFT Source acquisition. Interest on the Sellers Note accrues at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	5.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	per annum and is paid quarterly. The Sellers Note principal and unpaid interest is due at the earlier of September&nbsp;2, 2016 or with the occurrence of certain specific events as outlined in the Sellers Note. The Sellers Note is included in &#x201C;Current maturities of long-term debt&#x201D; at December&nbsp;31, 2015, as the maturity date of the loan is within twelve months from December&nbsp;31, 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#333333;">
	Letters of Credit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	As of December 31, 2015, the Company has
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	outstanding letters of credit for the security deposits on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	real property lease agreements. These letters of credit are for a total of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	$100
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	, reducing the borrowing capacity under the Revolving Credit Facility to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	$39,900
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	. The Company pays a fee on the outstanding letters of credit at the applicable margin, which was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	4.50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	as of December 31, 2015, in addition to a fronting fee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	0.125%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#333333;">
	per annum.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#333333;">
	Deferred Financing Costs
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Certain costs incurred with borrowings or the establishment or modification of credit facilities are reflected as a reduction to the long-term debt balance. These costs are amortized as an adjustment to interest expense over the life of the borrowing using the effective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	interest rate method.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#333333;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	17
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11. Income Taxes

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Income tax expense from continuing operations and effective income tax rates consist of the following:
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The net change in the valuation allowance was a decrease of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$403
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and an increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$678
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 and 2014, respectively.&nbsp;&nbsp;The change in the year ended December 31, 2015 related to foreign currency exchange rate fluctuations, partially offset by a change in net operating losses of foreign locations,.&nbsp;&nbsp;The change in the year ended December 31, 2014 related to net operating losses of a foreign location.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has potential tax benefits associated with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1,999
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of foreign operating loss carryforwards, which expire at various dates from 2024 through 2033. Due to the uncertainty of being able to recognize these loss carryforwards, the Company has provided a valuation allowance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	100%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the tax benefit.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	At December&nbsp;31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	provision has been made for U.S. federal and state taxes on cumulative foreign earnings from CPI Card Group-Europe Limited operations of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	707
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, which are expected to be indefinitely reinvested outside of the U.S.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	he U.S. deferred tax liability associated with indefinitely reinvested earnings and profits is not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	material
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has analyzed its filing positions in all of the jurisdictions where it is required to file income tax returns, as well as all open tax years in these jurisdictions, and based upon its review, determined there are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	uncertain tax positions as of December&nbsp;31, 2015 and 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company is generally subject to potential federal and state examinations for the tax years after December&nbsp;31, 2010 for federal purposes and December&nbsp;31, 2009 for state purposes.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	19
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
